scripts.test: find ./test/internal-functional -name '*-test.js' | xargs mocha && find ./test/unit -name '*-test.js' | xargs mocha
scripts.resetDb:
echo '
wiping and rebuilding db
' && node scripts/reset-db.js
scripts.copyConfigSample:
echo '
copying fresh config
' && node scripts/copy-config-from-sample.js && tsc --lib es2016 config/*.ts
scripts.initialStartUp: yarn && yarn copyConfigSample && tsc --lib es2016 scripts/*.ts && yarn endpoints && yarn tsc
